key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to semiconductor shortages
Intense market competition and price pressures
Regulatory risks from changes in government policies and subsidies
Technological disruption from rapid advancements in solar and energy storage
Operational challenges from job cuts and restructuring
controversies: Significant job cuts (up to 1,100 jobs) as part of restructuring efforts
Downward revision of sales guidance due to supply chain disruptions
environmental_issues: Commitment to sustainability and carbon neutrality goals
social_issues: Job cuts impacting workforce stability and morale
Adherence to fair labor practices and human rights standards
governance_issues: Need for operational efficiency and cost reduction strategies
Focus on ethical business practices and compliance with international standards
